===== Disclaimer =====

The hacking skills taught in this course can be dangerous if used improperly. Students should be aware of the legal implication of their actions. Unauthorized hacking is a crime, and students who break the law will face possible criminal prosecution.

I take no responsibility for the improper use of technologies, tools and techniques I write about in these pages. Topics are covered for informational and academic purposes.
